## Connection interface

An active connection between two contexts

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Connection<M0 extends MethodsType = any, E0 extends EventsType = any, M1 extends MethodsType = any, E1 extends EventsType = any> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [close()](./post-me.connection.close.md) | Stop listening to incoming message from the other side |
|  [localHandle()](./post-me.connection.localhandle.md) | Get a handle to the local end of the connection |
|  [remoteHandle()](./post-me.connection.remotehandle.md) | Get a handle to the other end of the connection |
